alert.note: Alert for Central St. Louis; Koochiching; North St. Louis; Northern Aitkin (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 05 at 11:36AM CDT until April 08 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM CDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches through Thursday. Winds gusting as high as 30 mph. * WHERE...Koochiching, North St. Louis, Central St. Louis and Northern Aitkin Counties. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Mille Lacs Band, Big Sandy Lake area and the Bois Forte Band, Lake Vermilion and, Nett Lake areas. * WHEN...Until 7 AM CDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. Road conditions can also be found at 511mn.org for Minnesota or 511wi.gov for Wisconsin.

area.areaDesc: Central St. Louis; Koochiching; North St. Louis; Northern Aitkin
